data.message: How do we do our 2014 year?

replies.message: Great question, Selita! We'll be rolling out the Year in Review experience very soon at http://www.facebook.com/yearinreview. -Natalie
How do I share it please?

Hey Selita. To share your Year in Review, select share in the top right and choose the audience you'd like to share it with. For more information about adjusting who can see your Year in Review, visit: http://on.fb.me/18N0StN. Hope that helps! -Natalie
I know how to share a post or picture, but it doesn't have a place for me to share my 2014 year.

Thanks for the additional information, Selita. You should be able to see the share button on the top right of your personal Year in Review. If it's not there would you mind letting our team know at: http://on.fb.me/1h9rE68? Thanks! -Natalie
